title: I'm gonna play ranked.... FOR FUN
body:
I'm not the best, and i was S IV in season 3, and didn't play all season 4, now when i go back, I am gonna play ranked for fun, and make the most of every game, and NOT CARE if I win or lose, just play to win, and play to have fun. 

where ever I end up I am happy with, because at the end of the day, it is my best effort and I will be happy enough with that.
